column5: Here is a link to what the MNR have found to be the cause of the Carp die off in the Kawarthas and other surrounding lakes.  There was no mention of the MNR testing a new chemical, nor do they believe it was caused by aliens. You never know though, birds do fly from one lake to the next and with the Trent Severn Locks attaching all the infected lakes... maybe it has something to do with that...  http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business/LetsF...age/239472.html
I was at scugog today didn't see any carp floating around.
I hope there is none at Lake Seymou. I am fishing there this weekend.
Ron, Thanks for the link.  It is too bad the doom a gloomers will not read this.  Appears to be a normal cycle in nature.   John
Scugog, Sturgeon, Pigeon, Buckhorn,Chemong, Etc...got hit last year...so maybe somehow they are now immune ???  Thanks for the report Ron...
Yep, that herpes virus.  Too many hooking carp.
Anglers are advised not to consume any fish that appear to be sick, are dying or already dead.....  They really need to say this???  LOL
Thats good to hear Ron.LOL  Thanks for the report.
Thought you'd like to hear that Brian.... ha ha ha
"So,I'm the one that has to say it, GENETAL WARTS" quote Peter Griffen
Too many anglers kissing their catches and giving them herpes (coldsores)...
